sentence.Network_en: He had not expected the young man to reappear before evening.
sentence.Network_cn: 他没想到这位年轻男子会在黄昏前再次出现。

sentence.Network_en: Courage seems now to have deserted him. May it quickly reappear.
sentence.Network_cn: 他现在似乎失去了勇气，但愿他能很快重新振作起来。

sentence.Network_en: She went upstairs and did not reappear until morning.
sentence.Network_cn: 她上了楼，直到第二天早晨才再次露面。

entry.def: When people or things reappear, they return again after they have been away or out of sight for some time.

example.ex: Thirty seconds later she reappeared and beckoned them forward.
example.tran: 30秒后她又出现了，示意他们往前来。

sentences.sentence: "Her husband reappeared after having left her years ago"

auth_sentence.content: Stanton shivered, as if she might suddenly reappear.
auth_sentence.res_content: Stanton shivered, as if she might suddenly reappear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Stanton shivered, as if she might suddenly reappear.

auth_sentence.content: Years will pass before she will reappear in his mind.
auth_sentence.res_content: Years will pass before she will reappear in his mind.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Years will pass before she will reappear in his mind.

auth_sentence.content: Benign tumors rarely recur, but sarcomas can reappear after treatment.
auth_sentence.res_content: Benign tumors rarely recur, but sarcomas can reappear after treatment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Benign tumors rarely recur, but sarcomas can reappear after treatment.

sentences.en: She reappeared at my side with a novel.
sentences.cn: 她拿着一本小说再次出现在我身边。
